titles.title: A bill to amend the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007 to reauthorize the energy efficiency and conservation block grant program.
A bill to amend the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007 to reauthorize the energy efficiency and conservation block grant program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This bill reauthorizes through FY2030 the energy efficiency and conservation block grant program.
